name: Be a Surgeon
description:
ARE YOU READY FOR A DIFFERENT CHALLENGE ?

It's time to put on gloves and prove your worth !

You are Zack Starks, the new surgeon of the Confidence Hospital. Get the job and prove your worth to reach the top!
Improve your skill as a surgeon and forget you to do the initial operations.


¡¡ IT'S TIME TO FIGHT THE MOST LETHAL STRAINS !!


Discover the fascinating history of this young surgeon and destroy the evil plans of a bio-terrorist organization.



features
_________

- Perform all operations, from routine, through excisions of tumors, to strains created by bio-terrorists.
- A thrilling story that will catch you from the start.
- 9 different types of tools
- Wake up the power within you,must learn to control it and make stop the time.


Languages: English , Spanish
